subject: Career
title: Geographic Arbitrage
description: A quick, practical guide to Geographic Arbitrage.

hook.text: A San Francisco salary in a Bali apartment. Geographic arbitrage is the ultimate remote work advantage.

buildup.text: Geographic arbitrage means earning in a high-cost economy while spending in a low-cost one.

discovery.text: A $100K salary goes 3x further in Lisbon than in NYC when adjusted for cost of living.

twist.text: Companies are catching on. Many now adjust salaries by location, shrinking the arbitrage window.

climax.text: Tax implications are complex. Working abroad may trigger tax obligations in multiple countries.

punchline.text: Earn where the money is high. Live where life is rich.

quiz.question: What is geographic arbitrage in remote work?
options: Earning in a high-cost economy while spending in a low-cost one
Moving to the most expensive city
